participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Down-to-earth and hardworking, with a love for simple pleasures and country life.
participant_1.background: i only listen to country music. i drive a big truck and live in country. i'm an electrician. i have a pet cow. i work my parents farms.

participant_2.name: Luna
participant_2.personality: Imaginative and playful, with a touch of mischief and curiosity about the world.
participant_2.background: i live in the cloud. i am a little girl. i've superpowers. i like to make time stop.
